Address.value: XINGANXIAN PLAZA, BUILDING B,SUITE 21-1, LIANGLUKOU, CHONGQING, 400800, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Bit Origin Ltd, through its subsidiaries, engages in the cryptocurrency mining business in the United States. It is also involved in deploying blockchain technologies. The company was formerly known as China Xiangtai Food Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bit Origin Ltd in April 2022. Bit Origin Ltd was incorporated in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.
